name: VEKLURY 100 MG POWDER FOR CONCENTRATE FOR SOLUTION FOR INFUSION
treatmentDescriptions: Veklury is indicated for the treatment of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID 19) in:•	adults and in paediatric patients (at least 4 weeks of age and weighing at least 3 kg) with pneumonia requiring supplemental oxygen (low- or high-flow oxygen or other non-invasive ventilation at start of treatment) •	adults and paediatric patients (weighing at least 40 kg) who do not require supplemental oxygen and who are at increased risk of progressing to severe COVID-19
form: powder for concentrate for solution for infusion

packaging.name: VEKLURY 100 MG PWDR FOR CONCENTRATE FOR SOL FOR INF 1 VIAL
